languages.text: "Он бывший капер и беглый псайкер. Одно время занимался {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Хладным торгом{/g} и поставкой наемников-нелюдей, но пиратские привычки не избыл и грабил подельников. В результате даже среди преступного отребья прослыл отморозком — а это надо постараться. Саргона коварен, жесток и непредсказуем".

"He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."
languages.original_text: "Он бывший капер и беглый псайкер. Одно время занимался {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Хладным торгом{/g} и поставкой наемников-нелюдей, но пиратские привычки не избыл и грабил подельников. В результате даже среди преступного отребья прослыл отморозком — а это надо постараться. Саргона коварен, жесток и непредсказуем".

traits.locale_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the Cold Trade and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

"He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

languages.text: «Es un antiguo corsario y un psíquico fugitivo. Estuvo involucrado en el {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g} y en negociaciones con mercenarios xenos, pero sus hábitos de pirata le superaron y empezó a robar a sus socios. Ahora, incluso la escoria criminal le considera despiadado, lo que es todo un logro, en mi opinión. Sargona es astuto, cruel e impredecible».
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

traits.locale_text: «Es un antiguo corsario y un psíquico fugitivo. Estuvo involucrado en el Comercio Frío y en negociaciones con mercenarios xenos, pero sus hábitos de pirata le superaron y empezó a robar a sus socios. Ahora, incluso la escoria criminal le considera despiadado, lo que es todo un logro, en mi opinión. Sargona es astuto, cruel e impredecible».

languages.text: “他是个在逃的灵能者，以前当过海盗。之前有段时间，他参与了{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}，当上了异形雇佣兵的供应商。但到最后，他开始重操旧业，抢劫起了他的贸易伙伴。即便是在那群暴徒和罪犯之中，他也是个相当惹人厌的家伙，这也算是很了不起的成就了。萨戈纳生性狡诈、残忍，难以捉摸。”
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

traits.locale_text: “他是个在逃的灵能者，以前当过海盗。之前有段时间，他参与了冷市贸易，当上了异形雇佣兵的供应商。但到最后，他开始重操旧业，抢劫起了他的贸易伙伴。即便是在那群暴徒和罪犯之中，他也是个相当惹人厌的家伙，这也算是很了不起的成就了。萨戈纳生性狡诈、残忍，难以捉摸。”

languages.text: « C'est un ancien corsaire et psyker en fuite. Fut un temps où il s'adonnait au {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} et au recrutement de mercenaires xénos, mais son âme de pirate a pris le dessus et il s'est mis à dépouiller ses associés. Aujourd'hui, sa sinistre réputation le précède jusque dans les cercles criminels... Ce qui n'est pas donné à tout le monde, vous en conviendrez. Sargona est rusé, cruel et totalement imprévisible. »
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un ancien corsaire et psyker en fuite. Fut un temps où il s'adonnait au Commerce Froid et au recrutement de mercenaires xénos, mais son âme de pirate a pris le dessus et il s'est mis à dépouiller ses associés. Aujourd'hui, sa sinistre réputation le précède jusque dans les cercles criminels... Ce qui n'est pas donné à tout le monde, vous en conviendrez. Sargona est rusé, cruel et totalement imprévisible. »

languages.text: 「彼は元私掠船および逃亡中の異能者です。かつて、彼は{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷たき取引{/g}と異種族の供給に関与していましたが、海賊としての癖にあらがえず、仲間を盗み始めました。今では犯罪者集団の間でさえ、彼は不浄な扱いにくいやつとして知られています。これは認めるべき成果でしょう。サルゴナは狡猾で冷酷、そして予測不可能です」
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は元私掠船および逃亡中の異能者です。かつて、彼は冷たき取引と異種族の供給に関与していましたが、海賊としての癖にあらがえず、仲間を盗み始めました。今では犯罪者集団の間でさえ、彼は不浄な扱いにくいやつとして知られています。これは認めるべき成果でしょう。サルゴナは狡猾で冷酷、そして予測不可能です」

languages.text: "Eski bir izinli korsan ve kaçak bir ruhsezer. Bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret'e{/g} atılıp paralı asker tedarikine bulaşmış ancak korsan alışkanlıklarından kopamayıp ortaklarını soymaya başlamış. Suçlular arasında bile güvenilmez bir pislik olarak biliniyor. Kabul edersiniz ki kendisini bu denli dibe batırmış olması büyük bir başarı. Sargona kurnaz, acımasız ve öngörülemezdir."
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. At one time he was involved in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} and the supply of xenos mercenaries, but his pirate habits got the better of him and he started robbing his associates. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."

traits.locale_text: "Eski bir izinli korsan ve kaçak bir ruhsezer. Bir zamanlar Soğuk Ticaret'e atılıp paralı asker tedarikine bulaşmış ancak korsan alışkanlıklarından kopamayıp ortaklarını soymaya başlamış. Suçlular arasında bile güvenilmez bir pislik olarak biliniyor. Kabul edersiniz ki kendisini bu denli dibe batırmış olması büyük bir başarı. Sargona kurnaz, acımasız ve öngörülemezdir."

languages.text: "Er ist ein ehemaliger Freibeuter und ein flüchtiger Psioniker. Er war seinerzeit am {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} und der Versorgung von Xenos-Söldnern beteiligt, ehe er sich der Piraterie verschrieb und anfing, seine Partner zu berauben. Mittlerweile hält ihn selbst der kriminelle Abschaum für einen üblen Halunken ... was durchaus eine Leistung ist. Sargona ist verschlagen, grausam und unberechenbar."
languages.original_text: "He is a former privateer and a fugitive psyker. Now even among the criminal rabble he is known as a nasty piece of work — something of an achievement, you will agree. Sargona is cunning, cruel, and unpredictable."
